title: Wrap input sequences in query interpretation
body:
The sequences in this page run beyond the whitebox while the sequences
are pending:

http://rna.bgsu.edu/jar3d/result/cf108656-7332-4274-a8f3-5281595c34e7

title: Prevent Jmol from floating all the way down
body:
I'm not sure this is possible, but could the jmol window only float to
the bottom of the loop results section. Otherwise you can scroll down
too far and it covers the sequences. Doesn't look good.

title: appletLoaded
body: appletLoaded is not defined

title: Loop positions
body: Display loop positions and sequences when showing results.

title: Jar3d fails with multiple long sequences
body: The cause is unknown, probably something is being passed to jar3d that it can't handle causing a crash.

title: Loop counts
body: The site displays the counts of all hairpins, internal loops and junction loops but only displays results from internal loops. This is confusing.

title: Display problem for large inputs
body: When JAR3D is given a "large" input (many sequences for a single loop or a long RNA with multiple loops) the data initially displayed is often incorrect.  It pulls the wrong rows from the database, and does not always pull 10.  Waiting for a while and refreshing the page fixes the issue.  The correct information is in the database.  This is happening on jar3d production and dev.

title: Different results with the same input
body:
@jimroll @blakesweeney 
User report: different results are generated depending on whether the plain sequence or the fasta >seq header are used

title: Incorrect sequence length error report
body:
@blakesweeney @jimroll 
User report: Some positions were indicated as larger than 1000, although there are only 200 nt in the seq

title: JAR3D results from multiple releases
Submitting Hairpins
body: @jimroll and @AntonPetrov, the front end will not allow us to submit hairpins at the moment. This should be fixed.

title: Clicking "About Us" in the header gives an error
body:
@blakesweeney @jimroll 

It links to an old URL: http://rna.bgsu.edu/main/about-us/

title: Provide a list of loops on the results page to make navigation easier
jsmol view overlaps results table on small screen sizes
add help to column titles in alignment view
body: a little tricky since the size of the table is variable but not difficult

title: condense column number listings
improve input checking
body: long RNAs with no secondary structure do not provide an error or submit.  error messages when given could give more information.  can someone who is better with javascript tackle this one?

title: color ACGU in alignment view
body: Currently all nucleotides are colored black.  Coloring A red, C yellowish, G green, U blue would make it easier for users to see sequence conservation or non-conservation.

title: label the currently-shown motif group by jsmol window
body: In the JAR3D results page, one uses a radio button to tell the jsmol window which motif group to display in 3D.  There should be text above or below the jsmol window indicating which motif group is being shown.

title: JAR3D results should focus on groups with non-zero acceptance rate
body: Let's start by displaying all groups with non-zero acceptance rate, and only those groups.

title: provide links to RNA secondary structure prediction tools
body: And give some suggestions for how to use them.

title: Provide local installation instructions
body:
- use Docker
- include a small SQL dump file

title: Review old branches
Show motif names on results pages
body: It will be useful to show names like "GNRA" and "Kink-turn" in JAR3D search results.
